description: For [HomeLand Justice](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0038), threat actors exploited CVE-2019-0604 in Microsoft SharePoint for initial access.(Citation: CISA Iran Albanian Attacks September 2022)

external_references.description: CISA. (2022, September 23). AA22-264A Iranian State Actors Conduct Cyber Operations Against the Government of Albania. Retrieved August 6, 2024.
